title: Kuo: Redesigned MacBook Air on track for this year, but it might use an M1 chip
content:
Apple just introduced a new Mac today, but the rumors never stop. This time, analyst Ming-Chi Kuo shared on Twitter another prediction, this time about the rumored MacBook Air. In line with other rumors, Kuo believes that the new laptop will be announced later this year with a new design, but the analyst says that it will not have an M2 chip.

moreâ€¦

The post Kuo: Redesigned MacBook Air on track for this year, but it might use an M1 chip appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Ming-Chi Kuo believes that the new MacBook Air will be announced later this year with a new design, but with an M1 chip.
